hero.title: Test Your Regex Patterns
hero.subtitle: Real-time regex testing with instant results. Test JavaScript, Python, and Java patterns.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs. All plans include 14-day free trial.
pricing.trialNote: No credit card required for trial

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Yes! You can cancel your subscription at any time. No questions asked.
faq.a2: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for all paid plans.
faq.q3: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a3: We accept all major credit cards via Stripe. Enterprise plans can pay via invoice.
faq.q4: Is there a discount for annual billing?
faq.a4: Yes! Save 20% by paying annually. Contact us for details.

account.title: My Account
account.subtitle: Manage your subscription and account settings

subscription.title: Subscription
subscription.freeDesc: You're currently on the free plan with limited features.
subscription.proDesc: You have access to all Pro features including unlimited patterns and code export.
subscription.teamDesc: You have access to all Team features including collaboration and API access.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.

form.title: Send us a message
form.name: Your Name
form.subject: Subject
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us more about your question or feedback...

faq.title: Quick FAQ
faq.a1: Yes! Go to Pricing and choose your plan.
faq.a2: Pro users can export regex to Java, JavaScript, and Python from the tester.
faq.a3: Check our pattern library for common examples and explanations.

library.title: Pattern Library
library.subtitle: Save, organize, and share your regex patterns
library.limitMessage: You've reached the free tier limit of 5 patterns. Upgrade to Pro for unlimited patterns!
library.loginMessage: Save and organize your regex patterns by logging in
library.emptyMessage: Start testing regex patterns and save your favorites here
